title: Any word on when the new Champ select is coming to normals?
body:
Trying to start a normal game can be a nightmare, you make a call, but who knows when you actually joined the room and what calls have been made before you actually joined.

You than get players who call after you and just don't care, either forcing you to choose something else, or get fucked over because you already called, waited, and locked in.

Or those like myself who make a call, someone else calls that lane before you, and by the time you try make a second call all that is left is that one role you cannot play.

Not to mention the 10 minutes it takes to start a game after all the queue dodgers.
